caption:
“The Spirit shakes the bones of history.”

Reflection:
What once was lifeless begins to move again. Breath returns to forgotten dreams.

Commentary:
This reflection draws from Ezekiel’s vision — revival comes when Spirit stirs what the world declares dead. Renewal is divine rebellion against decay.
